content.question: Visitors of the Kaaba approach the shrine in the hope of

choices.label: entering the shrine’s interior to circumambulate the altar contained within
leaving offerings that they have brought near the foot of the shrine’s Eastern wall
touching the Black Stone, which is embedded in the eastern corner of the Kaaba
seeing the ancient statues of saints that are placed in niches in the shrine’s interior

content.answer: touching the Black Stone, which is embedded in the eastern corner of the Kaaba
